scripts.dev: shadow-cljs -A :dev watch app & npm run styles-dev
scripts.release: shadow-cljs -A :dev release app && npm run styles-release
scripts.styles-dev: onchange -o '> public/main.css && lightningcss --bundle public/main.css -o public/main.css' -i $(find src -name *.css) -- cat $(find src -name *.css)
scripts.styles-release: cat $(find src -name *.css) > public/main.css && lightningcss --minify --bundle public/main.css -o public/main.css
